website_summaries.verdict: A first-rate CVT fluid that performs beautifully in all CV transmission Honda models.
pros: Provides long-lasting oxidation resistance, minimal deposits and extended drain intervals
Delivers better fluidity at cold temperatures for easier starting
Specially formulated for Honda vehicles equipped with CV transmissions
cons: Intended for use in Honda vehicles with first-generation CV transmissions only

customer_reviews.title: Use genuine Honda CVT fluid only for your Honda
customer_reviews.text: Bought these with same day delivery for a 2011 Honda Insight with 62k miles on it. Found instructions for the drain and fill process on YouTube and it was extremely easy and fast. The Insight has the acceleration shudder that common with these CVTs. It’s gone now after fluid change. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced 05 Honda Civic Hybrid CVT fluid at 65,000 miles. Mild harsh starting clutch feel and sound have disappeared with the fluid change. Old fluid was dark. I also dropped the sump and changed the trans filter. Needed 4 quarts of fluid with the trans filter change.
customer_reviews.author: Dan'l

customer_reviews.title: Only the best for early Honda CVTs
customer_reviews.text: Only the best for early Honda CVTs! We lived in Japan for 3 years and our Honda Fit was experiencing slipping starting from a dead stop (a common issue if you don't keep up with the fluid changes). We replaced the fluid and solved most of the issues. Slipping mostly dissipated but permanent damage was already done to the transmission by the previous owner. With the fluid changed we were able to stop the damage and it lasted us for our time in Japan.
customer_reviews.author: Mach

customer_reviews.title: Fixed Civic Hybrid Judder
customer_reviews.text: If your Honda calls for this- USE IT!!! My Honda Civic had the dreaded judder. After flushing the old, black, unknown fluid from the tranny and performing the judder service bulletin procedure the transmission performs flawlessly. I was surprised at how clear this fluid was. It's not cheap, but it's worth it. Don't skimp a few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: stevie6101

customer_reviews.title: Not Genuine. PLEASE READ
customer_reviews.text: This is not genuine Honda fluid. It destroyed the transmission in my Honda Civic within 100 miles. You can buy the actual stuff from a Honda dealership for way less. Do not buy this. You will regret it and potentially need a new transmission.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Russell

customer_reviews.title: No more juddering
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three quarts and the filter for a 2010 Insight. Definitely an overlooked maintenance item. Solved a lot of the gripes I have with the transmission, mainly the juddering/slipping especially when cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Wish these weren’t as expensive but you do get quality OEM stuff. Don’t go for other “similar” products. It will mess up your car in the long run only to save a few dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo

customer_reviews.title: Not for a 2013 or newer Honda CVT trans!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy for a 2013 CVT or newer!! This is not the right oil!!
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Fixed the Jutter.
customer_reviews.text: One of the 4 bottles arrived incorrectly. Fortunately, I needed only exactly 3! The CVT Fluid itself worked wonders to help my 2005 Honda Civic CVT smooth out. I had the Jutter and now there is no juttering, still some skipping.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree' W.

customer_reviews.title: Best price on honda insight cvt fluid
customer_reviews.text: I changed the cvt fluid in a 2003 honda insight. Measured the fluid that came out as it was right on the mark and put the same amount back in. Online consensus is to use original equipment Honda Cvt fluid so I did. Changing the cvt fluid is super easy. Easier than an oil change. After putting in the new cvt fluid, the car no longer shudders from a start and downshifts much smoother. Be sure to get a new cvt drain plug washer.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Larkins

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great... Less filling
customer_reviews.text: Seriously how do you right a review for transmission fluid. I mean its what is designed for my car, it worked fine. I put some in my 05 HCH and now its a little over full. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Hilldawg

customer_reviews.title: The right oil!
customer_reviews.text: It is the only oil; to use according to the manufacturer. Arrived on time with good packing. Carries Honda label.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Rigmont

customer_reviews.title: Convenience is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I'm particular about what I put in my Honda Civic Hybrid because I want it to last forever (lol)! I live in the middle of nowhere so being able to order this and have it delivered is priceless! OEM so quality is no question.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Holton

customer_reviews.title: OEM is OEM
customer_reviews.text: OEM is always valuable, especially with relatively new tech like CVT
customer_reviews.author: Reed Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Just like the dealer's stuff I always use this in my civic.
customer_reviews.author: Jigmaster

customer_reviews.title: Other than that seemed fine my transmission hasn't given out yet
customer_reviews.text: Fluid was not sealed. Usually when I buy this the bottle has a foil seal under the cap this did not. Other than that seemed fine my transmission hasn't given out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Craig M.

customer_reviews.title: This is the only fluid recommended for my cvt
customer_reviews.text: I bought my crz used and had no idea when the tranny was last serviced. This is the only fluid recommended for my cvt. After changing the fluid along with the inline filter. I noticed the car is more responsive from Auto stop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Genuine stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered was received quickly and was exactly as described! Works great for my 2004 civic CVT.
customer_reviews.author: the average chicagoan review

customer_reviews.title: The real deal, but watch out!
customer_reviews.text: First, a word of warning -- this CVT fluid is only for Honda vehicles with 1st generation CVT. There is a warning label on the back of the jug stating this, and the product code(CVT-1) seems to indicate this as well. No worries for me, as I have a 2005 Honda Civic Hybrid with a 1st generation CVT. As for the cost, it was worth it for me, as the local dealer's parts shop closes before I can get there during the week.
customer_reviews.author: scifi-o-phile

customer_reviews.title: Only use Genuine Honda Fluid for the CVT transmission!
customer_reviews.text: This fixed my slippage problems...Was using a Valvoline CVT fluid by a previous owner. Switched to the Genuine Honda Fluid and the slippage and noise went away.
customer_reviews.author: FrankAndCate

customer_reviews.title: I like that it each bottle was bagged
customer_reviews.text: No broken seals. I like that it each bottle was bagged.
customer_reviews.author: Neela

customer_reviews.title: Only for Honda CVT transmissions
customer_reviews.text: This is the official Honda fluid so yea is good.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Automatic Transmission Fluid for Honda Insight with CVT
customer_reviews.text: Just what my Honda Insight Gen1 needed to do a flush for the CVT transmission. Also remember to order a new crush washer for the drain plug. Using a new crush washer stopped the transmission leak.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Moy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: good, but one is leaking oil when i got this.
customer_reviews.author: Takashi Takahashi

customer_reviews.title: Standard
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for my 2001 Insight. Genuine fluid from Honda. It improved the shifting and jerking a bit but Next time I am going to try a synthetic CVT fluid to see if it is better.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Robling

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper in town
customer_reviews.text: I was able to find this item for $8 at my local Honda dealership. I recommend you give yours a call before making this purchase to be sure you're getting the best deal.
customer_reviews.author: P. Donofrio

product_meta.title: Genuine Honda Fluid 08200-9006 CVT-1 Continuously Variable Transmission Fluid - 1 Quart
product_meta.description: Honda genuine fluids are the exact original equipment manufacturer (OEM) fluids that your vehicle came with. When you select a genuine OEM fluid - you can rely on the high quality and effectiveness of the product and brand without having to guess if the product will work in sequence with your vehicle. Protecting your investment is important and choosing the right fluids can be challenging. So don't risk another minute by searching and buying something that might work. Stick with what you know and choose a genuine OEM Honda fluid. Advanced wear protection to reduce wear and increase service life
feature_bullets: Fits all CV transmission Honda models
Formulated specifically for Honda vehicles equipped with CV transmissions
Made with the newest technology base oils and additives
Provides increased oxidation resistance, fewer deposits and longer drain intervals
Better fluidity at cold temperatures for easier starting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars81 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
